title: #184: The Trial Of The Century
description:
As the trial of Ghislaine Maxwell begins, the opportunity for the corporate media to misdirect what is left of their dwindling viewers into thinking that Maxwell was simply a victim is very high. Those that do not understand the whole story may be misled, but nobody should blindly follow the MSM as they distract and deceive.

The evidence will show that Ghislaine Maxwell was a co-conspirator in the raping, grooming, and trafficking of children all over the globe to very important and well-connected victimizers and pedophiles. She was deeply involved with every facet of the operation.

Nobody should be surprised once they come to understand that Maxwell comes from a deeply disturbing family that has their dirty little fingers in many data collection operations, be they collecting information through computers (Christine Maxwell), the World Economic Forum (Isabel Maxwell), or through hidden cameras on the Lolita Express.
